burgers.name: Classic Cheeseburger
burgers.description: Juicy beef patty with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce on a toasted bun.

burgers.name: Spicy Chicken Burger
burgers.description: Crispy chicken fillet with spicy mayo, lettuce, and pickles on a soft bun.

burgers.name: Veggie Delight Burger
burgers.description: A plant-based patty with lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo on a whole wheat bun.

burgers.name: BBQ Bacon Burger
burgers.description: Smoky BBQ sauce, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, and grilled onions on a beef patty.

burgers.name: Double Patty Monster
burgers.description: Two juicy beef patties stacked with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and house sauce.

burgers.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
burgers.description: Sauteed mushrooms, Swiss cheese, and garlic aioli on a grilled beef patty.

burgers.name: Crispy Fish Burger
burgers.description: Golden-fried fish fillet with tartar sauce, lettuce, and cheese on a brioche bun.

burgers.name: Grilled Chicken Burger
burgers.description: Marinated grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and honey mustard sauce.

burgers.name: Buffalo Ranch Burger
burgers.description: Crispy chicken fillet tossed in buffalo sauce with ranch dressing and lettuce.

burgers.name: Avocado Bacon Burger
burgers.description: Fresh avocado slices, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, and house sauce on a beef patty.

burgers.name: Peanut Butter Burger
burgers.description: A unique blend of peanut butter and bacon on a juicy beef patty.

burgers.name: Hawaiian Teriyaki Burger
burgers.description: Grilled pineapple, teriyaki sauce, and Swiss cheese on a beef patty.

burgers.name: Ghost Pepper Burger
burgers.description: Spiciest burger with ghost pepper sauce, jalapenos, and pepper jack cheese.

burgers.name: Mac & Cheese Burger
burgers.description: Loaded with creamy mac & cheese, crispy bacon, and cheddar cheese.

burgers.name: Truffle Mushroom Burger
burgers.description: Truffle-infused mushrooms, Swiss cheese, and garlic aioli on a premium beef patty.
